name: 3D Gravity Rocket
description:
3D Gravity Rocket is a game about a mechanical robot that could fly thanks to having a propeller on its head. In the game you need to collect a certain number of nuts to win the level. You will complicate the passage of the game unusual gravity and physics of the main character. In order not to die, you must not collide with the wall. Try to be as accurate as possible!

Key game features:
- Unusual physics
- Pleasant design of the game
- 12 different levels to pass
- 12 achievements
